winterhold:Frostbolt.NAME: Frostbolt
winterhold:Frostbolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! winterhold:Frost damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

winterhold:Shockbolt.NAME: Shockbolt
winterhold:Shockbolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! winterhold:Shock damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

winterhold:Sparks.NAME: Sparks
winterhold:Sparks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! winterhold:Shock damage to a random enemy.

winterhold:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
winterhold:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! winterhold:Fire damage to yourself. NL Deal !D! winterhold:Fire damage.

winterhold:HoseDown.NAME: Hose Down
winterhold:HoseDown.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! winterhold:Resistant to winterhold:Fire and !M! Vulnerable to winterhold:Shock. Exhaust.

winterhold:OilUp.NAME: Oil Up
winterhold:OilUp.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! winterhold:Resistant to winterhold:Frost and !M! Vulnerable to winterhold:Fire. Exhaust.

winterhold:Ground.NAME: Ground
winterhold:Ground.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! winterhold:Resistant to winterhold:Shock and !M! Vulnerable to winterhold:Frost. Exhaust.

winterhold:ElementalFlow.NAME: Elemental Flow
winterhold:ElementalFlow.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your Combo reaches a multiple of !M!, gain 1 Strength.

winterhold:SlowBurn.NAME: Slow Burn
winterhold:SlowBurn.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked winterhold:Fire damage, apply !M! winterhold:Singe.

winterhold:Browse.NAME: Browse
winterhold:Browse.DESCRIPTION: Choose winterhold:Fire, winterhold:Frost, or winterhold:Shock. Put a random card from your draw pile that deals that damage into your hand.

winterhold:FetchFireAttack.NAME: winterhold:Fire
winterhold:FetchFireAttack.DESCRIPTION: Put a random card from your draw pile that deals winterhold:Fire damage into your hand.

winterhold:FetchFrostAttack.NAME: winterhold:Frost
winterhold:FetchFrostAttack.DESCRIPTION: Put a random card from your draw pile that deals winterhold:Frost damage into your hand.

winterhold:FetchShockAttack.NAME: winterhold:Shock
winterhold:FetchShockAttack.DESCRIPTION: Put a random card from your draw pile that deals winterhold:Shock damage into your hand.

winterhold:ChainLightning.NAME: Chain Lightning
winterhold:ChainLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! winterhold:Shock damage to ALL enemies.

winterhold:FireRune.NAME: Fire Rune
winterhold:FireRune.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. The next time you're attacked, deal !D! winterhold:Fire damage to your attacker.

winterhold:SimonSays.NAME: Simon Says
winterhold:SimonSays.DESCRIPTION: Each time you deal spell damage, this power chooses winterhold:Fire, winterhold:Frost, or winterhold:Shock randomly. If the next damage you deal is of that type, gain 1 Strength. If not, lose all Strength.

winterhold:ColdBurn.NAME: Cold Burn
winterhold:ColdBurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! winterhold:Frost damage. Deal !D! winterhold:Fire damage.

winterhold:Hypothermia.NAME: Hypothermia
winterhold:Hypothermia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a *Void into your draw pile.
winterhold:Hypothermia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a *Void into your discard pile.

winterhold:Conductivity.NAME: Conductivity
winterhold:Conductivity.DESCRIPTION: This turn, all winterhold:Shock damage ignores Block.
winterhold:Conductivity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, all winterhold:Shock damage ignores Block and is increased by 2.
